trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a filter or filter table attempts to access the body of an unbuffered message.
This exception is thrown when a filter or filter table attempts to access the body of an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FilterInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FilterInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FilterInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with data that specifies the source and destination of the stream and the information required to serialize the exception.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains all the data required to serialize the exception.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that specifies the source and destination of the stream.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FilterInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> with a specified error message and the filters that attempted to inspect the body of the message.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref> that attempted to inspect the body of the message.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FilterInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with a specified error message and the inner exception that caused the current exception.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that caused the current exception to be thrown.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FilterInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with a specified error message, the inner exception that caused the current exception, and the collection that contains the filter that attempted to inspect the body.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that caused the current exception to be thrown.

The <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref> that contains the filter that attempted to inspect the body of the message.
Gets the collection of filters that contains the filter that caused the exception to be thrown.
In the case of a filter table, this collection does not necessarily contain all offending filters.
It only contains the filter(s) that caused the violation.
It is quite possible there are other filters that would have committed a similar violation had processing not been aborted.

The <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref> that contains the filters that caused the exception to be thrown.
